column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
Gerry, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month
Haldol deaths, 45-54 Male  (Caregiver)
column9: This medication is extremely dangerous and I am sure it has been causing deaths all around the country/world.  Pt's have respiratory depression and Haldol cannot be reversed with Narcan.  They need to be placed on a ventilator.  Read the list of all the horrible side effects of this drug.  The packaging is terrible and I am sure that wrong doses are given.  The Haldol kits are extremely dangerous!!!  If you love your patient do not give this medication.  Several patients aspirate!   Aspiration pneumonia is a terrible way to die.  Many patients pick at the air, are combative with smaller doses, larger doses they drool and cannot talk or swallow.
